website_summaries.verdict: Cuddly, soft, and mimics comfort of mother's fur while promoting sleep, health and better behavior.
pros: High walls offer sense of security for smaller dogs
Easily transport from room to room
Designed for convenience: machine washable and stuffed with virgin air-loft fibers to keep loft up to three times longer
cons: Sherpa-like fabric mats and bed can turn over easily because it is on the light side
Too small for dogs over 10 pounds
Bed doesn't keep its shape after several washings

customer_reviews.title: Great little bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 lb Chihuahua, Ricky, has forgotten about all the other choices of beds in the house after this bed entered the scene! He's in it as I write this. When you first take it out of the bag, it is new of course so it's pretty fluffy, your pet may tumble over a little bit until it stabilizes and takes to his/her shape. After that, you're golden. It's soft, deep and dark, just like they want it! You should get it, in fact, get two, so you don't have to keep taking it to one room to another all the time like I do. I'm ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: pawesomegirl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have a 'slightly' overweight pug who's aging and getting arthritis, so I wanted to get him something that's supportive to lay on. He has loved this from the moment he sat on it! I have to take it from room to room for him!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and snug!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Best doggie bed I've ever owned. My dogs absolutely adore it, they seem to feel extra cozy and snug in it.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia G.

customer_reviews.title: Instant favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I draped my cats favorite fleece blanket over this and it was an instant success. It is super fluffy and great for kneading - at least, my cat seems to think so! He even hangs over the edge sometimes like the pictures here. Definitely suggest it if you've got a cat that doesn't quite sleep in your bed, but does sleep nearby. Update: I've even started moving it around the house to him, and he doesn't need the blanket anymore now. He just loves it outright.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was going to love this bed for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to love this bed for the dogs...unfortunately the first bed was not sewn properly in the part where they would lay and Amazon replaced it only for the second one to come apart at the bottom. So with that said...the dogs loved it for about 3 weeks. This item is very poorly made and it was a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Iggygal

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loved it instantly
customer_reviews.text: I pulled this out of the box and for once, the kitten wanted the product more than the box! She climbed in and started kneading the bed, purring super loud! I bought two, one for upstairs and one for downstairs, because she follows me around and now always has somewhere warm to lay. She’s only 6lbs now and has tons of room to grow into these! Great product!!! Haven’t washed it yet, I’ll update the review when I have.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable my tush!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this on time and my 4month old pug Duke dropped his pillow for this comfy bed. He loved it,.. Til I had to wash it because on an accident he had. I followed the instructions to the "t" and washed it alone as you can see in the images, pictures speaks for themselves. When I went to take it out of my washer much to my surprise there was a pillow fight and I wasn't invited!! Jokes aside it wasn't fun to fish out the stuffing from washer. You can draw your own conclusions.
customer_reviews.author: Eva B.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love this deep dish bed! When one leaves, another one jumps in their place! I'm attaching a picture of one of my dogs who is too big for the bed, but he doesn't seem to care! HAHA I've washed it a couple of times already and it has washed up very nicely! I definitely recommend this bed to dogs of all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: DogMom

customer_reviews.title: All my dogs LOVE this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I need to buy a second one when they're in stock. As soon as one dog gets out of it, another one hops in. This bed is made of soft fabric and super cushy. It isn't incredibly structural, but that seems like a strength - my dogs enjoy kneading it and folding up the walls to get comfortable. It's a little smaller than the product photo might suggest, but big enough for my <30lb Boston Terriers to curl up comfortably for an hour or two every day. I haven't tried washing it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Review_homies

customer_reviews.title: My dogs (all under 10lbs) all love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs (all under 10lbs) all love this bed!! It's rarely empty and my mean ass chihuahua that no one challenges finally had enough and claimed it as his so now I need to buy another one for the other dogs! I love that it keeps it's shape despite how my dogs lay on it. It was even tested by my dad's overweight dachshund who didn't fit into it so he just laid right on top flattening it and the bed still bounced back into its original shape
customer_reviews.author: Goofy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small dog!
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu/terrier mix dog loves this bed!! He slept in it last night and has been in it all day. He weighs about 13lbs and fills it up. My larger shih tzu is 20lb and would not fit. My dog curls up in this and feels safe and warm. The sides are perfect to give him that cave-like feeling that he previously got by sleeping under my bed or snuggled up to me. Thinking of buying another to have one in each floor of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My chiweenie is in love with this bed. She loves to snuggle under blankets and arrange them exactly how she wants. This bed is perfect for that and it's fuzzy and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Picture purrrfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my smaller kitten. None of them were interested even with bribes of treats. Then exactly a week later my larger cat started sleeping in it by herself. Mind you, we have over 9 beds to select from so I'm happy it's getting used.
customer_reviews.author: Florabama

customer_reviews.title: My Little Dog Loves This Bed!
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is wonderfully soft and the high sides suit a dog who likes to curl up and snuggle down into his bed. I bought this bed and another warming fleece bed, to give my dog a choice of sleeping arrangements. He much prefers this soft little bed. I have washed it and dried it already and it still looks new. It seems to be well worth the price, as my dog spends hours in it. I'm glad that Amazon offers such a wide selection of pet products and I don't have to drive to a store!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mason in NC

customer_reviews.title: Mojo's favorite deep dish
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty absolutely loves this bed. At first, she was hesitant to give up her old, ratty $5 bed, but with a little cat nip and a little patience she finally realized how amazing this bed is. She loves leaning her head on the sides, and the deepness of it allows her to snuggle inside of it really well. The material is a nice, soft, plush material. Would definitely buy again in the future once it gets old and ratty from her sleeping in it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: As soon as we opened up the box that was packaged nicely, she jumped right into the bed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to give this to my dog for Christmas but I just couldn’t wait. As soon as we opened up the box that was packaged nicely, she jumped right into the bed. It was the perfect size for her. She’s a small/medium beagle/mini greyhound mix. The fabric is soft and the bed is padded nicely for your dogs comfort. I’ll update review if there is anything concerning. So far, shipping was fast and it was packaged nicely. Would buy again from vendor as long as there is no issues but seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Meow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly cat who often seems to be chilled and uncomfortable. The bed comes sealed in plastic and immediately fluffs up into shape once removed from the plastic. It is extremely soft and has a smooth bottom. There is no shedding of the fabric at all. OK bottom line you know how finicky cats can be and how they immediately know if something has changed in their domain. My cat went and checked it out and as soon as I put a couple of treats in it to attract his attention, it became his new lounge area.
customer_reviews.author: Mackman

customer_reviews.title: Pug approved
customer_reviews.text: Over the summer I adopted a sweet 5 year old pug. I had so many things to buy in a short amount of time! I picked these bed as it had great reviews and was affordable. After a few days, my pug learned to enjoy it. She likes to rest her head on the side. But she only uses it when im working on projects or cooking. Otherwise she's by my side :) I was able to wash this in a normal, older model washing machine. It did take some time to dry and doesn't quite look good as new. But this bed still functions just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Antonea PayanTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: No toxic chemical smells!
customer_reviews.text: Read lots of reviews and decided to get this one... I was extremely happy to open it and have zero factory chemical smells. I ordered it weeks before I would need it for my kittens with the intention of off gassing it and/or having to launder it a few times but I am SO pleasantly surprised that it smells completely neutral. (And I have an insanely sensitive nose!) Thank you Best Friends by Sheri For making non-toxic pet beds. I will definitely be ordering another one of these when my kittens get larger and want their own!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.  Chili loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and was very pleased that it was packed air tight. Upon opening it the air came out and it exploded into this big lush gorgeous soft and well-made kitty bed. It didn’t take my cat very long to realize this was the best place to be! The quality is exceptional and I have not washed it because I just received it but I can tell it’s going to last for years. An excellent purchase and my cat would say the same!
customer_reviews.author: Pepperoosky

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two the these beds for my yorkies and I absolutely love them.....And more importantly so do they. They were a little leary at first because they were something new, but that is common. I rubbed them with their old beds and their blankets and with-in a few minutes they were in them checking them out. The high sides are awsome cause it makes them feel secure and they lay their heads on it too.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Misshaped doesnt stay up right ..
customer_reviews.text: Bed is mis shapped because of box being small ..I thought shape would fix it self ...it didn't it falls over ...refunding getting the dougnut dog bed they sell it really nice.. measue ur doggie or kitty runs small on misshaped one ..my pet pampered he has 2 beds one for my mothers house he visits she bought doughnut 🍩 really picky poodle also he loves it...would have got but waiting list to long....good luck make sure ur animal stays warm they are on the floor alot.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pet bed
customer_reviews.text: My miniature dachshund loves this bed! The curls up in it, and likes to store her little toys in the deep crevices. It's great that it can be washed and doesn't have to be taken apart. My only challenge with washing it, is that I have a smaller washer, but that isn't the fault of the product. The only challenge I had was that it came so smashed that it took over a week to fully expand and has had an odd shape to it. However, Roxi thinks it's just grand! I would recommend and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: She's 4 1/2 and even when we take a warm blanket and shape it like a donut for her to snuggle in
customer_reviews.text: We have a Puggle who has always slept curled up in a tight ball. She's 4 1/2 and even when we take a warm blanket and shape it like a donut for her to snuggle in, she would always curl up in a tight ball. My husband and I are floored at her response to this bed. We've never seen her stretch out like she does in this bed! She absolutely loves it and spends most of her time in it. More often then not - she's laying sideways, sprawled out and sleeping so soundly, she's snorking and dreaming. We are amazed and thrilled at how much our dog responds to this bed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: so I purchased this bed hoping to keep her warm and comfortable, and hoping the bed will help with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a dog that is part chihuahua, so she doesn't have a heavy coat. She is eight and has a birth defect that causes problems with her back legs. The vet warned me that she will have arthritis as she ages, so I purchased this bed hoping to keep her warm and comfortable, and hoping the bed will help with arthritis. She lives in the bed, and only leaves it to eat and potty, so she must love it. She even moves it from room to room. If I find one for an adult human, I may get one for myself. Others who have seen pictures of Minnie in her bed have said the same.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed. Yes
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. Yes, it's not sturdy at all, but that's how it's supposed to be. Just a nice, soft, cushy bed for your lil' one. My pup (a pug...5 1/2 months at 14 pounds) likes it. Curls up in it & also spreads across it, depending, but finds it comfy. Word to parents of teething pups though,...I got the brown fluffy one, so he also likes to treat it as a chew toy. He drags it across the room sometimes, & pulls at the fleece threads. Lil' stinker, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cuddler is our pup's FAVORITE snuggling spot!
customer_reviews.text: My little doggie loves this deep dish cuddler so much that I had purchased another one. The new one is a bit larger so I contacted the company to see why the difference in size for their Standard size in just one year since I purchased the first one. I received EXCELLENT SELLER RESPONSE and am satisfied that all was done to ensure my doggie's happiness with her cuddler. I would advise that if you want your cuddler to be its fluffiest, then wash and dry it several times which will fluff up the stuffing. I highly recommend this product for your four legged snugglers!!!
customer_reviews.author: JulieS

customer_reviews.title: My Puppy LOVES this cuddly bed.
customer_reviews.text: When AnnieB, a 9lb Morkie, first saw her bed, she jumped in and out, pulled it around, all that good fun stuff. Within a day or two she curled up and fell sound asleep. Yes, She fell in Love with this bed. Now, when tired she jumps in, moving all around getting all comfy, then down for a long winter nap. I am so glad I picked this particular bed for her. The Bed itself is so cute, and actually curls around whatever position she picks.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Dog and cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Super fluffy and comfy bed, my dog and my kitty love it as you can see in the picture and even with my dog scratching it up so “get cozy” it’s still maintained it’s shape and fluff after about 6 months. Easy to clean and seems durable. As some people stated it does not always stay in place and it moves around a lot with your pets shuffling but my dog doesn’t seem to mind that it doesn’t stay straight up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stacy rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I review anything, yes, you should buy this bed!!!! It's totally worth the money. I'll get the bad out of the way first: They aren't very cushiony. The good? The beds are very soft, and bigger than I thought they'd be. I purchased two, and they both came in one box, each bed wrapped individually, and were vacuum sealed. My dogs love them, and my cats are stealing their beds as well, so I have a feeling I'll be ordering a couple more for them too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: My beagle LOVES this bed. She carries it around from room to room and snuggles right in. This is so far the only bed that neither of my dogs has tried to chew to pieces. It's the perfect size for her because she loves to feel like she's being hugged whenever she's snoozing. I would recommend this to anyone with a small-medium sized fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Go Ahead, Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fur my Yorkie...when it came, she knew exactly where to go, right in! Got the brown, to be neutral in my home. Very well constructed with thick sherpa fabric. Deep dish, I wish they made this for humans. They say this can be washed which I hope is true because that was important to me. The only problem I'll have is keeping the cats out of this. Don't want that sticky cat fur. The bed is perfect size for her as you can see in pic. Could take a little larger, up to 25 lbs, I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: alida bohdan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Plush but Not Durable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When we received this bed for our dog, we were a little disappointed because it was fairly light weight and not very sturdy. However, it's very plush, thick and soft. The bottom fabric and light weight allows our small dog (about 10 lbs) to slide the bed across the floor and flip the bed around. Our dog loves to curl up in this bed and loves the round shape. We've had this bed for approximately 3 months but it looks like it's much older. The outer fabric has worn well and the bed is somewhat unsightly. We'll be replacing this bed as soon as we can find a nice looking and more durable bed.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable. Seams starting to split and my dog is not that active for being 15 years old. Also, they said this was meant for dogs up to 25 pounds and my dog is only 17 pounds and he barely fits! This is the same quality as a $10 bed you could find in the pet aisle of your local grocery/drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny V

customer_reviews.title: My dogs won’t use them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won’t even get in them! I tried putting each in their own, but they jumped out. Thinking that if I put them in place of their old beds they would use them, but nope, they both prefer to stay out of them. Thought that if we washed them and put their blankets in them but that didn’t work either....so we have two new useless beds
customer_reviews.author: Mobilius

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed but cats won't touch it
customer_reviews.text: My cats want nothing to do with this. It's well made, very soft and a great size for cats. Disappointed because I really thought they would like to snuggle in it. Its not the first time I've bought them something I thought they'd love and they totally ignored it.
customer_reviews.author: beancounter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bed
customer_reviews.text: oh my gosh this is the perfect dog bed. My dog is 13 lb and she curls up in a ball and it is the perfect size for her. She lays over the edges of it or she curls up in a ball. she doesn't have any trouble sleeping in her bed when I sleep in mine. I wish I had one of these for every room in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Margie S

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy - be aware
customer_reviews.text: the picture looks really cozy and stable as a pet bed. However item received is very flimsy. My dog is 15 pounds (boston terrier/rat terrier mix), but he clearly doesn't like this bed as much as he liked his old one I got from PetSmart for $30 something dollars in terms of stability & the size. He tips over a lot in this bed. So he ends up in my bed all the time again :( Not happy. We received this bed for a few weeks (over a month maybe) now, hopefully he will get used to it later on, if so, I will update my review, but doesn't seem likely since it's been a few weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pet bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark brown bed for my 12 yr old Chihuahua and he LOVES it. It's so fluffy and soft he just loves snuggling and sleeping in it. I wanted to get him something that felt good to his little aging body and this seems to do the trick. I think my 10 yr old LhasaPoo would like it too but I need to get her a bigger size...it tips over when she gets in because she's too big.
customer_reviews.author: J Peterson

customer_reviews.title: soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bed. The dogs walked around it for a couple of days but it has now become the place to be. You have to set it up against something for a few days for it to kind of settle (not fall over), but after they use it a while it makes it's own form. I smooshed this one down a bit in front so they could get in easier (chihuahuas). I will order another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Qwkslver

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I are very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Picture taken minutes after I put the bed on the floor! The bed is super soft & plush. I followed the unboxing directions and am very pleased. My dog is 13yrs old & blind. I was looking for a bed he can snuggle into and he immediately did! Can’t speak to the durability as it just arrived. But so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Alisson G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium and small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and squishy bed that our dog has been happy to curl up in. I haven't washed it yet, but will need to soon and I'm relying on the advertised durability to ensure he still has a warm place to sleep at night. I was a little surprised by the size because the picture is rather deceiving. We have a 30 pound puggle and all 30 pounds fit in just fine, but there's no extra room. Any pup larger than ours might have a hard time curling up in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: So good for old friends in cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: Immediate controversy over who would be in the cuddler - the old small dog for whom it was purchased or the younger but more comfort focused dog who I thought was too big for it. But he loves curling up in it and when the old dog gets up he sneaks in and snuggles down. It is very cushy for old bones and the way the top makes it into a little cave is pretty cool. It keeps the dogs quite warm, which matters in cold climates, even in April. I probably need to buy another...
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: A hit the first night
customer_reviews.text: We just got this in the mail today and it's a hit already with our Dachschund/Yorkie mix. He loves it! I waited to get both dogs one to make sure one would love it before buying it for the second one. I think I can go ahead and get another one. I don't think Buster is going to let anyone take this one from him. It's a hit!! Love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K. Arasato

customer_reviews.title: Rat terriers and puggle love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 30 pound rat terriers and our 35 pound puggle who fight over a large bed we bought. When it arrived we almost sent it back as it looked to small for any of our three. I placed it on the floor and within 30 minutes they were taking turns or I should say fighting over who was going to curl up in it. They like the small confined space and seem to curl up in a ball and squeeze into it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gibson

customer_reviews.title: I have a rat terrier that loves to cuddle under ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a rat terrier that loves to cuddle under blankets. She is also always attached to my hip. Well we received the deep dish bed yesterday and she refused to leave it! even when i was snuggled up under the covers. The product was exactly as described. I definatly reccomed it if your have a snuggly pup
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Dog and cat love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10lb mixed breed dog and fat cat love this already. It's the perfect size for them. If your small dog (or weird cat) loves going under the covers, then they'll love this too. I wouldn't recommend this for arthritic cats or dogs, as they do have to move their legs in a wide range of motion to get into this.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: 5 Paw Approval from Sadie
customer_reviews.text: We just brought this 3 yo dog from the shelter 5 days ago, she's pretty skittish and has been trying to burrow under our pillows at night. I put her in this bed with "her" blanket and she loves it. She's 14 lbs, about the size of a Jack Russell and she fits perfectly all curled up.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: The dog that doesn't like beds wanted one.
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs, a 10lb chi mix and a 17lb terrier mix. The terrier mix usually does not like beds (she likes blankets on the floor) but when I got this bed for the chi mix, the terrier mix kept stealing the bed from her. The chi would get upset and barking would ensue until the "problem" was "fixed". I instantly purchased another bed and shipped it as fast as I could to our house. Now both dogs have a bed and they are happy snuggling in them....even if they now steal each others beds....
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cozy bed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this bed, it was soft and velvety. Unfortunately, I had to send it back because my dog would not get in it. She prefers her old bed and blanket for whatever reason. I was hoping she would take to it, but I returned it because its was obvious she wouldn't. It's really worth purchasing though.
customer_reviews.author: jill adair

customer_reviews.title: Thought was put into the making of this excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Shih-Tzus have had a multitude of beds and they are very easy going so they cozy up without issues. However this is a whole other experience for them. It is clear they cannot wait to go to bed now and they do not want to get out of bed either since the comfort they experience is just intoxicating to them. What a joy this is to watch. I think I should just buy a bunch so they have these for life!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Edelman

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves the bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft squishy donut hideout with a tall back that my cat loves. I never thought she would use a pet bed. I really bought it for medium size dog, it’s more a cat size even though it says medium dog? The sides are squishy like the marshmallow beds but not as thick. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office when I take my dog to work. When I opened it and put it on my bed, she immediately crawled into it. She now prefers to sleep in it vs sleeping with me in bed! It's a little wobbly (she's a small dog), meaning that the base isn't very solid, but she's a small dog so it helps her get out easily.
customer_reviews.author: saucycraftster

customer_reviews.title: VERY SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I thought my baby would just tear this bed up because every bed I buy he plays with it and tears it up. My Cavashon is 2yrs old and 10lbs. He actually played with it the first day the next night I found him balled up sleeping like a baby so I guess I can say he likes it. He has been sleeping in it every night since, I say buy the bed you wont regret it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn’t care for it
customer_reviews.text: Received this item after 1 week, seller contacted me to ensure I was happy with product shortly after. But I purchased for my cat and it’s been almost 2 months, she doesn’t care for it. I’m still leaving it out though to see if she’ll come around. But that’s why I could not give it 5.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: w out of 3 cats slept in it on day of arrival. Will update should anything change. Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving is 4 stars so far because it arrived as described. It wasn't down on the floor 5 minutes when cat number one jumped into it to check it out and fell asleep in it. Cat number two jumped in few hours later when first cat vacated it. Second cat fell asleep in it and is it in still. First cat returned and had to sleep in cat basket bed next to it. NExt, I'll have to check on washability. It does seem durable enough for cats and small dogs that don't chew. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Puppy likes!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for our other pup that is now 3 and just bought one for the new pup and it is his go to now. It is soft and it cuddles him like they say although he is growing so fast it wont last long.
customer_reviews.author: Oden AK

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever
customer_reviews.text: I cannot explain how much my dog loves this bed. From the first time he saw it, he did a vertical leap into it, and it has turned him into a completely worthless sack of potatoes. He’s an elderly guy and kinda picky about where he sleeps. It’s so soft and fluffy, it was an instant hit. He doesn’t want to ever get out of it. I have washed it and it did fine in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Too small but otherwise okay
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped my 21lb mini golden doodle would fit in this and it is too small for her. I kept it anyway hoping my 11lb smaller mini poodle Maltese mix would use it. He doesn't seem to care for it but I did find the mini golden doodle in it the other day. Not sure how she managed to curl up in it but she did. I like the bed and just wish the size descriptions were more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Anonmymous

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last week as a replacement bed for my dog but my black cat claimed it. Then my other cat tried to take it and the two cats ended up sleeping together in it. So I bought a second one and my dog still has her old bed!
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: 20lb Terrier Mix Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20lb Cairns (20" long, 26" including his head) Terrier Mix and he loves this bed.its really soft and flexible and fits to his body's needs (almost like memory foam?). However he fits perfectly in it. If he was any bigger it wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Luc

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the bag and unfurled the bed, my 6lb dog jumped into it. She literally hasn’t gotten out of bed all day today (other than going for a walk and eating). I’m gonna go ahead and say that she really loves it! The bed is still kinda flattened and I dunno if it’s ever gonna look like how it is in the product photo, but I think my dog likes being inside the “taco”.
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't leave the bed. Normally he's trying his hardest to cuddle on the couch with us, but not now. He's a Chiweenie, and about 15lbs. He fits perfectly!! Very plush. Seems to be good quality. My husband said we'll need to buy a second for upstairs now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: The dog really likes it
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Washed it a couple of weeks ago (front load washer-I'm not too sure it would hold up to a conventional agitator washer). Dried out, as per the instructions and it came out alright. The dog likes it, so I like it too (haven't used it myself, so it's anecdotal). Haven't washed it yet, so don't know how it'll turn out. I'll update when we do.
customer_reviews.author: Not Me

customer_reviews.title: Super fluffy and warm
customer_reviews.text: These beds are great. After opening the package, the bed fluffs up. After a day or so, it is super fluffy. I’ve bought two of these. My dog looooved his bed. And the cats would sneak in it when he wasn’t looking, so the cats loved it too. He’s a mini schnauzer and it’s the perfect size for him. He likes to curl up in a ball in it and he uses the side of the bed to prop his head up when he’s watching us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Like the Picture
customer_reviews.text: In the picture, this bed looks super comfy, full and plush. In reality, its flimsy, thin and has zero stuffing. Its basically a thin mat with poorly constructed sides that collapse. My dog won't go near it and she is a small 10 lb little thing. The cat has just started laying on top of the collapsed sides for padding.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybuggin7

customer_reviews.title: The best bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for our 15yr old malti-poo and she loves it! She is small enough that we can't even see her in it when she is on our bed! She took to it right away. It washes up and dries in shape! I wished I would have seen this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: PJHANSON

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't your dog look cute in this walnut
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was using an old comforter as a bed because we thought he liked the cushion. Turns out, he just needed this WALNUT! He seriously loves the bed. Quality if fine and we will see how long it lasts. I would recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: DRockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Dogs didn't want to share so I had to buy another
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one cause my dogs love to sleep on my luv sac bean bag. We have two dogs and they both loved the one we got so I had to buy another, cause they dont have to share. It's nice and warm for the upcoming winter. I have a maltipoo and a terrier poodle mix, 6lbs and 14lbs. They both fit in it great
customer_reviews.author: keisa

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My dog is absolutely spoiled, this is her fourth dog bed in the house. She seems to love it, but when she tries to climb in the back wants to come forward (she doesn't mind as she likes being snug). Perfect to my dog but does not shape well.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonSweets

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I can see where some people may not like this, but I think you have to get use to it. My dog loves it. He likes the option to sleep anyway. Plus it is basically nice and soft all around. I like it is not hard or has hard sides. My cats love it even more, even though I bought it for my dog. I agree that it kinda lays funny, but once a pet gets in it it is 100% perfect. I would say if you want something harder or that has harder sides this is not for you. If you want something cozy for your pet then I think this is the product!
customer_reviews.author: nleff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It feels great and my dog loves it however the top part never wanted to stand up since I received it. The top part flops over onto the bottom part so it looks like a clam shell. My dog just lays on it while it’s closed up. It still works but it’s not how it should be, it’s disappointing and I should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: bed no stability
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy my dog flipped out of the bed .product should have a stronger bottom and sides would not by again. Would. Not recommend to anyone to buy Not good for any pet . she flipped over VERY UNSAFE FOR ANY PET.WITH THIS SIZE BED OR LARGER. CALLED MANufacture DIDN'T CARE COMment NOT GOOD FOR ALL DOGS THEY ARE AWARE OF PRODUCT MATTER I AL CONCEP IS GOOD WOULD NOT BUY OR RECORD THIS rating SHOUld BE ZERO NOT ONe STAR . COMpANY DOESN'T CARE OF SAFETY
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie T. La Porta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beds, our cats live them, they are big enough for 2 full grown cats to snuggle down in
customer_reviews.text: We have a "family" of cats that have taken up on our porch. It started with one lone female and, yes you guessed it, she had 4 adorable kittens and decided to leave them on the back porch with us! Well now they are all "fixed", including the Grandpa who decided to start coming. In fact he is amazing with the little ones! I bought 2 of these and they love them. I will be buying another one as they out-grow these. We live in Georgia and don't have a whole lot of extremely cold weather and with these I feel confident out little band of felines will be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived folded. Which is fine, don’t know how long it’s been folded. It’s lopsided even when my puppy is in it. Also the fibers are all over the place. I’ve had it for about a week. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soft but won’t sit still
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft but very unstable. Every time our small dog jumped in, moved around or got out, it rolled over and we had to right it. Really a shame because it was otherwise nice. Returning and going back to the search for a soft, stable dog bed he can sleep in all night.
customer_reviews.author: Cielkay

customer_reviews.title: My Chihuahua Minpin mix LOVES this bed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure at first how this would work out because it's so cushy and will flop around as he lays in it. We put it on the couch in my den with his heating pad in it and he runs to get in it (now that he's used to it). He looks sooo comfy that I wish I could have one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Moon Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these beds and our Chihuahuas LOVE them! I unpacked them, the dogs sniffed them and practically dove in, curled up and took a nap. Very cushy and looks well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Dempsy Winans

customer_reviews.title: Princess loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty Princess loves her bed. She went right to it when we put it next to her. She kneads, then has a bath, then sleeps for hours. Its so soft and cozy. She loves to stretch out too! Get one...your kitty will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: My cat spent the first hour sitting outside of it ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat spent the first hour sitting outside of it making bread on it. He loves it and spends a lot of time in it... he likes that it cuddles him
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around for quite some time for a good dog bed. Most are quite expensive. This is a great dog bed for the price! Ordered two for my min pins. One is 7lbs and the other is 12lbs. These beds work great for both!! I definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: No can do!
customer_reviews.text: Rough and not at all inviting to pet. Hard to clean and folds over onto cat. So he’s written this off as a place to steer clear of. I cannot even give the other one (still in wrapping) to anyone. One look and they say”my pet would not use that!”
customer_reviews.author: Maryethel

customer_reviews.title: Clamshell
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have said, this is not fluffy, it does not stand up. It lays over like a clamshell. If your doggie likes to hide in small spaces and inside blankets like mine does then your pup will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after first wash. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The bed did not hold its form even after watching the video from the seller. The bed fell apart after the first wash and all the filling came out. It was too damaged to repair, I just tossed it out. There are better quality beds at your local pet retail stores around the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: She actually looks a lot like the pup in the photo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Prime Day for my new puppy, a 9 month old hound mix dog. This bed was smaller than I thought it would be. It's very soft and plush, but too small for my medium-sized dog. Luckily, I have a smaller dog too, and she loves this bed. She actually looks a lot like the pup in the photo. Just keep in mind the size of your dog. 20 pounds or less and you are probably ok. Any bigger, and you may need to look for another size.
customer_reviews.author: T.Haas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bed for our schnauzer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a guest bed for my daughter's schauzer ! Initially thought that it would be too small but the dog went right to it and cuddled up and slept with his face on the lip! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: V Jonn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 17lb and 47lb mixed dogs love this bed, even the big boy still curls in a ball since it was his first doggie bed. They love the high, soft sides to curl up in, lean on, or stretch out on
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Ruby

customer_reviews.title: This was nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: This was nice and soft, but it was quite small for me medium size dog. I probably should have checked a sizing chart 1st. I think a cat would like it or a small dog. I have a corgi and cava corgi and both did not really seam to understand it was for them. I will have to try to help them understand that I got them a little resting spot.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Gave away. Too small, not firm enough sidewalls to hold upright for pet to climb in.
customer_reviews.text: These beds would not stand upright enough for my dogs to climb in. That ended up sleeping on top of them and then moved to the floor. We washed their old beds and gave This bed to Goodwill. Sizing was also small. My 13 lb dog was ok, but the 18 lb dog was tight.
customer_reviews.author: HipMamma

customer_reviews.title: little dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this bed. She's 25 pounds and runs cold and really feels cozy in this all night. I was a bit afraid she'd feel cramped bc she barely fits in it, but randomly during the day she'll go to my room and choose to get in it. I think she feels safer cuddled up with a barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I went with this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Pictured is my dachshund/beagle mix immediately loving his new bed moments after it is out of the box. I went back and fourth on what bed to buy for a while but I am so glad I got this one. It’s super soft and it’s perfect for him to curl up in and also rest his chin on. It’s really like a cozy deep dish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It took some getting use to, but now he loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My bandit loves his bed. It did take some getting use to but now it's his go to place in the living room when he wants some alone time. I have put it in the washing machine and clothes dryer once and it cleaned just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: they both love this little snuggly bed and I'm going to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the size of this and thought it could fit both of my small dogs, but it is just a little too snug for their liking. They are small to medium sized mini schnauzers so it probably was too small from the get go for their size and I just didn't do the measurements correctly! At any rate, they both love this little snuggly bed and I'm going to buy more so they each have their own and in both living room and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: A Tack

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this bed and it's the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this bed and it's the perfect size for her, but she does love to dig at it and the brown material is EVERYWHERE in our house. I'm not sure if it's as much that it's prone to shedding as it's the dog's fault for tearing at it so much. Regardless, it's super soft and she enjoys having her head propped up on the side while she sleeps!
customer_reviews.author: B. A.

customer_reviews.title: Hate/Love
customer_reviews.text: My 12lbs Chihuahua-Poodle Mix hated this bed when I got it. After a few months she warmed up to it. Now it's her favorite spot in the living room. She assumes "hot dog" position and lounges in it until she falls asleep. If you're on the fence about sizing, go bigger.
customer_reviews.author: TFran

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bed was way smaller than expected. My 15lb Lhasapoo immediately snatched it out of my hand, and started playing with it. She tho it was a toy! Lol Seems like it would be nice for a tiny dog. Mines has never slept in or even attempted to lie in, even after putting her in it, and showing her it was a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenisha

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it....it's the first bed that I've bought her that she actually uses. Other reviews say it is poor quality and unstable but I haven't experienced that. Got mine 6 months ago and am getting another one for upstairs...ours is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: vandbri

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this - it’s cuddly and your fur-family will love it - might need to get another for the other cat!
customer_reviews.text: OMG our 17 year old cat Piglet LOVES this thing. She took to it on day one, beating our 2 y/o Bud-E to the ownership claim! She snuggles in it, she can prop her chin on the side when she’s watching TV and it keeps her toasty warm. We can even move her, in the bed, to another location and she doesn’t freak out - I think she feels safe in it. She looks so peaceful just when napping, chilling or hanging out in her Piggie bed!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to the max
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bed. I have two 8-10 lb dogs that love anything plush and soft and this certainly fit the bill. It's large enough for both, but they don't share because it's so comfortable to stretch out across. I couldn't figure out why you'd want the one side to be taller than the rest until I laid the bed with that side down and now they lay across that longer edge and the shorter edge creates a cocooning cave effect they love. It's so popular I will be purchasing a second bed.
customer_reviews.author: WyoJensie

customer_reviews.title: Zoe loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Zoe, is a Chihuahua Jack Russel mix, about 25 lbs. A FL dog, these cold GA nights had her shivering. I got this bed a few weeks ago and she loves it! I was afraid she wouldn't fit but she gets herself down in there and sleeps like a baby till 8 or 9 am. I washed and dried it on perm press yesterday and it came out perfect. She's in there snoring right now.
customer_reviews.author: Grammasami
